entry.title: Week two - Living and Breathing Ruby
entry.summary: This course is intense! Week two was super hard. So many things to learn and remember. I am still feeling good about this program. This is one of the hardest things I have ever done. And it feels good to go from one week to another; like an achievement...

entry.title: Week one - Begin with the end in mind.
entry.summary: The day was finally here. My first day at the IronYard. I had decided a few weeks ago to step out of my comfort zone and begin a 12 week period of learning. I sat in class super excited to meet my cohort - I would be continuing this journey with them...
